scripts.docker:emu: docker compose -p peachshare-emu -f docker/docker-compose.base.yml -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml --profile emu up --build
scripts.docker:emu:down: docker compose -p peachshare-emu -f docker/docker-compose.base.yml -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml --profile emu down
scripts.e2e: docker compose -p peachshare-e2e -f docker/docker-compose.base.yml --profile e2e run --rm playwright pnpm exec playwright test
scripts.e2e:headed: docker compose -p peachshare-e2e -f docker/docker-compose.base.yml --profile e2e run --rm playwright bash -lc 'xvfb-run -a pnpm exec playwright test --headed'
